meanings.definition: Move lightly and quickly or hurriedly.
meanings.sent1: The squirrel was skittering across the yard.
meanings.sent2: The mouse skittered away from the cat.
meanings.sent3: The skittering puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: Leaves skittered along the sidewalk in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The skittering sound of the skateboard wheels echoed in the empty alley.

meanings.sent1: The spider skittered across the ceiling.
meanings.sent2: The beetle skittered over the fallen leaves.
meanings.sent3: The skittering crab moved sideways along the sandy beach.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers skittered nervously on the edge of the table.
meanings.sent5: The skittering shadows danced on the wall as the flames flickered.
